articles.title: Reddit adds chat rooms for subreddits - Engadget
articles.description: The "front page of the internet" is bringing back one of the web's oldest features: chat rooms.

articles.description: BMW on Wednesday unveiled a host of teaser images and specifications for the upcoming 4 Series, which should debut later this year as a 2021 model.
articles.content: The extra juice can be used for efficiency's sake, prolonging stop-start time and permitting lighter engine loads at times, but it can also provide an additional 11 hp (and an unspecified amount of torque) when a driver smashes the gas pedal.
